Docs.summary: This package provides the interfaces needed to implement the Diffie-Hellman (DH) key agreement's algorithm as specified by PKCS#3.

remarks.para:
This package provides the interfaces needed to implement the Diffie-Hellman (DH) key agreement's algorithm as specified by PKCS#3.
The parameters for the DH algorithm must be accessed without unduly restriction as for example hardware repository for the parameters material.
